step.em: Bring a detailed list of acceptable and prohibited foods with you to the restaurant.

details.d: Create a laminated list of foods that contain gluten for easy reference.

d.l: Keeping this list on you at all times will ensure that you are ready to provide anyone with information about Celiac disease or gluten sensitivity

step.em: Go online and check the menu.

details.d: Some restaurants actually have gluten free options. But, this, of course, depends on the type of restaurant and food.

step.em: Ask for a hamburger with no bun!

details.d: You can do this at almost any place, just like asking for no mayo!

step.em: Ask about gluten-free options and ingredients.
